Vie de Monsieur de Renty. English
titleStmt.author: Saint-Jure, Jean-Baptiste, 1588-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Crook, at the sign of the Ship in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Vie de Monsieur de Renty.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "nouem:"; the 8 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
